mapper.select: insert into t_user(name, password, email) values(#{name}, #{password}, #{email})
mapper.update: update t_user set password=#{password},email=#{email} where name=#{name}
mapper.select: SELECT t_user.NAME, t_img_goods.name AS img_name, t_img_goods.path, t_goods.title, t_goods.price, t_favorites_goods.time_create FROM t_goods, t_favorites_goods, t_user, t_img_goods WHERE t_favorites_goods.id_goods = t_goods.id AND t_user.id = t_goods.id_user AND t_img_goods.id_goods=t_goods.id AND t_favorites_goods.id_user = #{id_user}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_favorites_goods WHERE id_user=#{id_user}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_record_task WHERE id_responder=#{id_user}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_record_transaction WHERE id_purchaser=#{id_user}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_review_transaction WHERE id_evaluated=#{id_user}

SELECT t_task.title, t_task.price, t_task.id_user, t_user.name, t_record_task.time_create, t_record_task.time_completion, t_record_task.state FROM t_record_task, t_user, t_task WHERE t_user.id = t_record_task.id_responder AND t_task.id = t_record_task.id_task

SELECT t_goods.title, t_goods.price, t_img_goods.path, t_img_goods.name AS img_name, t_record_transaction.state, t_record_transaction.time_create, t_goods.id_user FROM t_record_transaction, t_goods, t_img_goods WHERE t_record_transaction.id_purchaser = 14 AND t_goods.id=t_record_transaction.id_goods AND t_img_goods.id_goods=t_goods.id

SELECT t_user.NAME, t_review_transaction.content, t_goods.title FROM t_review_transaction, t_record_transaction, t_goods, t_user WHERE t_review_transaction.id_record = t_record_transaction.id AND t_record_transaction.id_goods = t_goods.id AND t_user.id = t_review_transaction.id_evaluator AND t_review_transaction.id_evaluated = #{id_user}
mapper.update: update t_user set state=#{state} where id=#{id}
update t_user set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
